pilots.caption: Best Pilot in the Galaxy
pilots.ability: While you defend or perform a primary attack, if the enemy ship's initiative is higher than the number of damage cards you have, you may roll 1 additional die.

pilots.caption: Bucket
pilots.ability: Before you expose 1 of your damage cards, you may look at your facedown damage cards, choose 1, and expose thet card instead.
